noSubstr.description:
Description

Enforce the use ofString.slice()overString.substr()andString.substring().
String.slice()is preferred overString.substr()andString.substring()because it is a more popular option with clearer behavior,
and it has a consistent counterpart in arrays.
Note thatString.substr,String.substringandString.sliceare not identical when arguments are passed.
For detailed differences, refer to the MDN documentation:
The difference between substring() and substr()
Differences between substring() and slice()
noSubstr.option: This rule has no specific options.
